Example Gallery
================

Examples of plots that can be created by SounderPy:

Sounding Types
--------------

.. figure:: _static/images/sounderpy_v2-0-6_example-sounding.png
   :width: 300 px
   :align: left

   SounderPy Full Sounding Plot

.. figure:: _static/images/sounderpy_v2-0-6_example-sounding.png
   :width: 300 px
   :align: right

   SounderPy Simple Sounding Plot


Sounding Settings
-----------------

.. figure:: _static/images/sounderpy_v2-0-6_example-sounding.png
   :width: 300 px
   :align: left

   SounderPy Full Sounding Plot in 'dark mode'

.. figure:: _static/images/sounderpy_v2-0-6_example-sounding.png
   :width: 300 px
   :align: right

   SounderPy Hodograph Plot


Data Types 
----------

.. figure:: _static/images/sounderpy_v2-0-6_example-sounding.png
   :width: 300 px
   :align: left

   SounderPy Full Sounding Plot in 'dark mode'

.. figure:: _static/images/sounderpy_v2-0-6_example-sounding.png
   :width: 300 px
   :align: right

   SounderPy Hodograph Plot

   SounderPy Full Sounding Plot in 'dark mode'

   :width: 300 px
   :align: right

   SounderPy Hodograph Plot
